text: In this video, we will cover
how to sign out of your Google account
from a mobile device and a computer.
From any Google page, such as Gmail,

locate your profile picture
in the top right corner
of the screen and then click on it
to open the drop-down menu.
Next, click on "Sign out."
If you have more than one account,
click on "Sign out of all accounts."

First, open your Google
homepage on your mobile browser.
In this example, we're using Safari.

Locate your profile picture
in the top right corner
of the screen and then tap on it
to open the drop-down menu.
Next, tap on "Sign out."
If you have more than one account,
tap on "Sign out of all accounts."

For Android, you'll have to
remove your Google account
from the phone's settings.
Go to settings

and then look for a setting
that includes accounts.
Choose the account you want to remove,
then press "Remove account."
